title: As Long As I'm Alive
lyrics:
Wake up with you every morning
And wonder how is it I'm still falling?
Darling, I could get lost in
Your eyes and all this cotton
At times, you're not sure 'cause you've been hurt

By others before who have deceived you

So that's when you ask if this will this last or not

Believe that I won't leave you



"Will I love you forever?" Is that what you're asking?

Don't know if I can, I'm gonna try

'Cause I can't pretend that I'll know what happens when we die

But I'm gonna love you at least as long as I'm alive

Ooh, at least as long, least as long as I'm alive

Ooh, oh, I'm gonna love you at least as long as I'm alive



Yeah, as long as I'm here and breathing

And as long as my heart is beating, oh

And although my bones might weaken

You know my love ain't fleeting



"Will I love you forever?" Is that what you're asking?

Don't know if I can, I'm gonna try

'Cause I can't pretend that I'll know what happens when we die

But I'm gonna love you at least as long as I'm alive

Ooh, at least as long, least as long as I'm alive

Ooh, oh, I'm gonna love you at least as long as I'm alive

I'm gonna love you at least as long as I'm alive
